job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: embark trucks is a leading selfdriving truck company bringing autonomous freight mainstream we have raised m by partnering with tiger global m series c and sequoia capital m series b to help grow our team and introduce our technology to the public currently we move freight daily between la and phoenix using our purposebuilt transfer hubs we have aligned ourselves with truck manufacturers shippers and carriers to integrate our technology into the freight ecosystem pursuing a business model where fleets own and operate our trucks this is an incredibly exciting time for autonomous vehicles and our team is looking to growltbrgtltbrgtour deep learning team focuses on developing systems that sense and perceive the world around our selfdriving truck within our deep
